task_name: Check my AMC gift card balance with gift card number 87654321 and pin number 9753 on amctheatres.

description.thought: To check the AMC gift card balance, I need to go to the AMC Theatres website and find the gift card balance check feature.  I will then need to input the gift card number and PIN.
description.action: Going to the AMC Theatres website (https://www.amctheatres.com) to locate the gift card balance check page.
